title: Energy Healing in Red Hook - Reiki, Acupuncture, Meditation & More!
description: Energy Healing in Red Hook | Reiki, Acupuncture, Massage Therapy, Chiropractic Adjustments, Aromatherapy and More!
cleaned_text: Energy Medicine for Optimal Body and Mind Energy Healing in Red Hook in Red Hook, NY: Energy medicine, energy therapy or energy healing is under the umbrella of complementary and alternative medicine. At Body Central Chiropractic, Massage and Bodywork Studi, our healers utilize some forms of energy medicine as an adjunct in helping our patients achieve optimal well being. Over the past many years, there have been various practitioners and healers that have utilized unconventional tools to effectuate a shift in health and well being. Some examples include, Therapeutic Touch, NAET, Emotional Release Techniques, Acupuncture, Mediation, Reiki and many more. Energetic Disturbances Helped with Energy Medicine Include - Residual Shock - Emotional Issues - Chakra Imbalances - Residual Childhood Emotions - Spiritual Imbalances Our energy healers have specific intuitive gifts, which they use to see beyond the physical body and to read what is most needed in the life for optimum growth on all levels. *** *** Schedule Your Appointment for Energy Healing Call (845) 876-7222 or Click the Button Below to Request an Appointment Online: Connect With Us Schedule Appointment the button to schedule your appointment!
